allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: 根据 Web Interface Guidelines 和 Vercel Best Practices 优化代码

- 移除 userScalable: false，修复无障碍问题
- 添加 colorScheme 和 themeColor 支持暗色模式
- 为装饰性图标添加 aria-hidden="true"
- 标题添加 text-balance 改善排版
- 优化 cookies\(\) 调用避免重复 await
- 简化 request.ts 代码结构，改进日志格式
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: update deps and add Claude Code skills

- Update Next.js 16.1.4 → 16.1.6
- Update React/React-DOM 19.2.3 → 19.2.4
- Update axios, biome, and type definitions
- Add Claude Code skills section to CLAUDE.md
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: 更新架构设计文档，添加代码审查优化

- 添加 Image 组件规范（参考 model-web）
- 添加上传取消支持（AbortController）
- 添加乐观更新模式（useOptimistic）
- 重命名文档为中文文件名
EOF
\)")

statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used_pct=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); short_dir=$(basename "$cwd"); git_branch=""; if [ -d "$cwd/.git" ] || git -C "$cwd" rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then git_branch=$(git -C "$cwd" --no-optional-locks branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then git_branch=" $(printf '\033[36m')(${git_branch})$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; fi; context_display=""; if [ -n "$used_pct" ]; then used_int=$(printf "%.0f" "$used_pct" 2>/dev/null || echo "0"); if [ "$used_int" -lt 50 ]; then color_code=32; elif [ "$used_int" -lt 80 ]; then color_code=33; else color_code=31; fi; context_display=" $(printf "\033[${color_code}m")[ctx: ${used_int}%]$(printf '\033[0m')"; fi; model_display="$(printf '\033[34m')${model}$(printf '\033[0m')"; echo "${model_display}${context_display} $(printf '\033[35m')${short_dir}$(printf '\033[0m')${git_branch}"
